DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study demonstrate non-inferiority three weekly intra-articular injection SUPARTZ three weekly intra-articular injection Euflexxa relief knee OA .
DOC.brief_title: Non-Inferiority Study Comparing 3 Weekly Injections SUPARTZ® vs 3 Weekly Injections Euflexxa® Knee OA
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study demonstrate non-inferiority three weekly intra-articular injection SUPARTZ three weekly intra-articular injection Euflexxa relief knee joint pain subject osteoarthritis ( OA ) knee measure VAS ( 0-100 mm ) Western Ontario McMaster Universities Osteoarthritis Index ( WOMAC ) Pain subscale score Change Baseline ( CFB ) Weeks 3 , 6 , 12 . Safety access record adverse event , concomitant medication , physical examination , vital sign .
DOC.criteria: Clinical evidence symptomatic osteoarthritis study knee classify accord Altman criterion . Symptoms study knee least one year prior screen visit Verified OA study knee Grade 2 3 accord modification grading system KellgrenLawrence ( KL ) radiographic severity . Willingness discontinue NSAIDs ( systemic topical ) nonacetaminophen analgesic use seven day five halflives prior first injection throughout study . Inability perform 50 foot walk test . Subjects rheumatoid arthritis , joint infection , inflammatory metabolic arthritis , Lupus dermatologic disorder skin condition close proximity study knee would preclude safe intraarticular injection . Prior hyaluronic acid injection study knee within six month screen visit . Intraarticular intramuscular steroid injection within three month screen visit study participation . Oral corticosteroid within four week screen visit study participation . History surgical treatment study knee arthroscopic intervention within three month prior screen visit . Clinically apparent tense effusion study knee examination determine either positive bulge sign positive ballottement patella ( patellar tap ) . Subjects clinically diagnose symptomatic OA hip .
